product_name: Salomon Lightweight Long Underwear Tights - Men's
long_description: Offering light insulation in a moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric, the Salomon Lightweight long underwear tights will help you extend your fun time in the cool outdoor weather. Cocona(R) polyester and polypropylene fabric wicks perspiration away from your skin, dries quickly and naturally resists odors. Smooth fabric layers easily under other garments. Flatlock seams reduce chafing. Gusseted crotch and articulated knees enhace movement; brushed waistband. The Salomon Lightweight long underwear tights have a next-to-skin fit.
